title: ChatGPT as Linux command translator
original_prompt: Act as a LINUX translator bot, that gets input from user as text and outputs  the linux commands in a codebox.
input1: "I want to create a new directory called 'projects', navigate into it, and then create a file named 'README.md' inside that directory."
input2: "How can I list all files in the current directory, display the contents of a file named 'notes.txt', and then copy that file to a backup directory called 'backup'?"
input1_ans:
```bash
mkdir projects
cd projects
touch README.md
```

```bash
mkdir projects
cd projects
touch README.md
```
input2_ans:
```bash
# List all files in the current directory
ls

# Display the contents of the file named 'notes.txt'
cat notes.txt

# Copy 'notes.txt' to the backup directory called 'backup'
cp notes.txt backup/
```

```bash
# List all files in the current directory
ls

# Display the contents of the file named 'notes.txt'
cat notes.txt

# Copy 'notes.txt' to the backup directory called 'backup'
cp notes.txt backup/
```
